Plant People revive face serum

Brand: Plant People

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: full spectrum hemp extract*, olive squalane oil, camellia seed oil*, kalahari melon seed oil, Blue Tansy EO*, Blue Chamomile EO*, Yarrow oil*, Hemp seed oil*, Rosemary EO*, Argan Kernel oil*, Atlas Cedarwood Bark EO*, Bergamot EO*

Directions: apply 5-8 d

ections: apply 5-8 drops of serum to freshly cleansed face and neck; Apply Morning and nightt for Optimal protection and restoration

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
